name: Jormuntide Ignis

ability.name: Stormbringer Lava Dragon
ability.description: Can be ridden. Enhances Fire attacks while mounted.

description: Legend says the Jormuntide Ignis was once a warrior who, after being wrongly convicted and cast into a volcano, returned as this Pal to destroy those who wronged him.

skills.name: Ignis Blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Dragon Cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: Flare Storm
skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Ignis Breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Tri-lightning
skills.description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

skills.name: Fire Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

skills.name: Dragon Meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
